EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2018-03-12-Field-East-ESB-New-York.Marketing Invitation 1.EMAIL - Marketing
EmailTemplate.subject: SAVE THE DATE: New York Rangers vs Carolina Hurricanes
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-newyork/]]> Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We're getting ready to host an exclusive event with our friends at Cisco in New York City for a presentation on workload automation at the Cisco Offices followed by an evening of hockey as the New York Rangers take on the Carolina Hurricanes. Data center and cloud advancements are happening at an unprecedented rate. That means more decisions, requiring a broader set of skills to keep your workloads happy. While you can't automate people, your can automate workloads, and accelerate business growth.
Executive Networking Series New York Workload Automation for Your Hybrid Cloud New York Rangers vs Carolina Hurricanes Monday, March 12th | Cisco NYC | 4:00 p.m.
Join your peers for the next stop in our Executive Networking Series, featuring guest speaker Gary Reiner, Operating Partner at General Atlantic, to share knowledge on tackling these challenges and learn how organizations like yours are adopting workload automation at the scale of hybrid cloud. Save the date for March 12th at 4:00 PM by registering at the following link: http://turbonomic.com/exec-newyork <[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-newyork/]]> <[[https://turbonomic.com/exec-newyork/]]>
We hope you'll be able join us,
The Turbonomic Team
